title: Online Asynchronous Instructional Design for Digital Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Digital Learning Environments, Foundational Theories of Language Education
context.additional_context: Customized educational design for enhancing professional language proficiency among specialized workforce practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create a language education curriculum design document using the backward design model.
Learners can plan asynchronous learning activities in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can develop HTML/CSS-based LMS content prototypes using AI tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
